document_data.name: Luiren shortbow
document_data.mainbody: A '''Luiren shortbow''' was a magic ''+1 [[seeking]] [[shortbow]]'' made and used by the [[Luiren]] [[halfling]]s. They were worth around 8,000 [[gold piece]]s.
